column5: COTTAGE GARDENS:  Private Rear Cottage ~ open loft concept w spiral staircase.  DOWNSTAIRS: Queen bed, bathroom w shower & dressing room.  UPSTAIRSHuge bathroom, claw-foot tub. Upstairs - twin bed Plus full kitchen, living room, desk. Two separate entrances, full laundry, big sofa makes great extra bed. 3 miles to downtown, 1/2 mile to I-10 & 45. Hideaway garden courtyard, historic trendy Heights neighborhood.
